author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Hitman Collaboration Trailer for State of Survival, a strategy RPG developed by FunPlus. Players can soon gain access to the Hitman Collaboration with Agent 47 joining the action. Agent 47 will be set on dismantling Providence’s plans, will be entering the apocalyptic world as a playable character. Additionally, Oybek Nabazov and Owen Cage will be arriving as villain bosses and Diana Burnwood as a storyline character. The State of Survival x Hitman Collaboration is coming soon to iOS and Android.
title: State of Survival x Hitman - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
With a new Grand Theft Auto 6 trailer comes new Grand Theft Auto 6 fan theories, and some of them seem plausible. Fans have spotted tiny details that further link the GTA series to Red Dead Redemption, and some possible gameplay details on how you might be switching between the two leads, Lucia and Jason. In other news, Pocketpair admits to having updated Palworld in light of Nintendo's lawsuit. The company said recent patches have tried to make enough changes to avoid Nintendo and The Pokémon Company's patent infringement claims. And finally, there's a new gameplay trailer for Mafia: The Old Country, along with a release date and details about the size and scope of the game. Also, it's $50! Great news considering everything in gaming is getting more expensive.
title: GTA 6 Fan Theories Are Pretty Wild (And Plausible) - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Launch Trailer for The Midnight Walk, a VR adventure horror game developed by MoonHood. Players will embark on a journey as the Burnt One to navigate twisted landscapes, outwit horrifying monsters, and uncover secrets lurking in the shadows. The Midnight Walk is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PC (Steam), PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2), and Steam VR.
title: The Midnight Walk - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Hunter Morrison Fractured Memories Trailer for MindsEye, a narrative-driven action-adventure game developed by Build A Rocket Boy. Players can get to know a little about Hunter Morrison, a visionary who utilized AI to make major breakthroughs in the world of MindsEye. Learn more about Hunter Morrison in MindsEye, launching on June 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#MindsEye #Gaming #IGN
title: MindsEye - Official Hunter Morrison Fractured Memories Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Norse: Oath of Blood teaser trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactics game set in the heart of the Viking Age. Step into the dark age of Norway as the new teaser trailer gives another look at the game, betrayal, and its world. In Norse: Oath of Blood, embark on an epic quest for vengeance as Gunnar, a young warrior whose destiny is forged in blood and betrayal. After the treacherous Steinarr Far-Spear murders his father, Jarl Gripr, and usurps his high seat, Gunnar's path is clear: rebuild, ally, and rise to reclaim honor and justice. 

Norse: Oath of Blood will be available on Windows PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S in 2025.
title: Norse: Oath of Blood - Official Viking Day Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'She Has to be Stopped' Clip for Andor Season 2, the second season of the action drama series leading up to Star Wars Rogue One distributed by Disney Plus.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events of “Rogue One” to tell the story of the film’s hero, Cassian Andor, and his transformation from disinterested, cynical nobody into a rebel hero on his way to an epic destiny. 

The series was created by Tony Gilroy, who also serves as an exe
title: Andor Season 2 - Official Clip (2025) Diego Luna, Adria Arjona, Muhannad Ben Amor

author: IGN
description: In a time where it seems like every game from the early 2000’s is getting a modern facelift, Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 remake is shaping up to be a welcome addition to a year full of excellent remakes and remasters, thanks to its faithful recreation of what made the PS2-era classics so memorable, its modern quality of life improvements, and its excellent soundtrack. Previewed by Nick Maillet
title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4: First Impressions of the Remake

author: IGN
description:
Challenge your strategic skills over 500 years of history. Watch the Europa Universalis 5 trailer for this upcoming grand strategy game. In Europa Universalis, master the arts of war, trade, diplomacy and government. Guide the destiny of any of hundreds of nations and societies in a simulated living world of unparalleled depth and complexity. Europa Universalis 5 will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Europa Universalis 5 - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: We've never seen anything like the just-announced Europa Universalis 5 from renowned strategy developer Paradox – or anyone – before. If the previous games in the franchise were your undergrad, this is a PhD game. Previewed by Leana Hafer
title: Europa Universalis 5 Is a Ludicrously Large, Dense Strategy Sequel

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Teaser Trailer for The Conjuring: Last Rites, the next installment in the horror movie franchise distributed by Warner Bros. and New Line Cinema.

The Conjuring: Last Rites delivers another thrilling chapter of the iconic Conjuring cinematic universe, based on real events. Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson reunite for one last case as renowned, real-life paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren in a powerful and spine-chilling addition to the global box office-breaking franchise.

Farmiga and Wilson star alongside Mia Tomlinson and Ben Hardy, who portray Ed and Lorraine’s daughter Judy Warren and her boyfriend, Tony Spera, as well as Steve Coulter returning as Father Gordon, Rebecca Calder, Elliot Cowan, Kíla Lord Cassidy, Beau Gadsdon, John Brotherton and Shannon Kook.

Chaves directs from a screenplay by Ian Goldberg & Richard Naing and David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick, story by David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick & James Wan, based on characters created by Chad Hayes & Ca
title: The Conjuring: Last Rites - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson

author: IGN
description:
Join the development team at Hangar 13 for a deep dive into Mafia: The Old Country in this latest trailer for the upcoming third-person action-adventure game. The developers dive into the making of Mafia: The Old Country, the story, the game's setting of rural Sicily, insights into the protagonist (Enzo Favara), gameplay, weapons, and more. 

Uncover the origins of organized crime in Mafia: The Old Country, a gritty mob story set in the brutal underworld of 1900s Sicily. Mafia: The Old Country will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC on August 8, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Official 'Breaking Omertà' Dev Insights Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for Stick, a new sports comedy series distributed by Apple TV Plus.

In “Stick,” Owen Wilson stars as Pryce Cahill, an over-the-hill, ex-pro golfer whose career was derailed prematurely 20 years ago. After the collapse of his marriage and getting fired from his job at an Indiana sporting goods store, Pryce hedges his bets, and future, entirely on a troubled 17-year-old golf phenom named Santi (Peter Dager). “Stick” is a heartfelt, feel-good comedy about a found family and their relationships set within the world of golf as it has never been shown before.

In addition to Wilson and Dager, the ensemble cast includes Marc Maron, Mariana Treviño, Lilli Kay, Judy Greer and Timothy Olyphant, and features guest appearances from golf superstars such as Collin Morikawa, Keegan Bradley, Max Homa, Wyndham Clark and more. Additional cameos include broadcasters Jim Nantz and Trevor Immelman, Good Good’s Matt Scharff, Brad Dalke and Garrett Clark, as well as golf
title: Stick - Official Trailer (2025) Owen Wilson, Peter Dager, Marc Maron

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay in this new Mafia: The Old Country trailer for the upcoming third-person action-adventure game. Uncover the origins of organized crime in Mafia: The Old Country, a gritty mob story set in the brutal underworld of 1900s Sicily. Mafia: The Old Country will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam) on August 8, 2025.

#MafiaTheOldCountry #Gaming #IGN
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new gameplay trailer for Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution, developer WayForward's upcoming retro-themed platformer that offers multiple modes (including a multiplayer battle mode) as the sixth game in the Shantae series. It's out this Summer on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3055950/Shantae_Advance_Risky_Revolution/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution – Official Gameplay & Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Frostpunk 2 trailer to see what's available in the first major content update, which features a new map called The Pit for the Utopia Builder mode and Tales from the Frostland, which are optional narrative challenges featuring unique quests, storylines, and rewards. The update also brings the Serenity Mode, the Frostkit 1.0 modding tools, an Overhauled Heat System, and more to the survival city builder game. Frostpunk 2 is available now on PC and Mac. Frostpunk 2's content update is available today, May 8, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Frostpunk 2 - Official Content Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Alien: Rogue Incursion - Part One, a single player action-horror game set in the Alien universe, is getting an upgrade. And you won't even need a VR headset to play. Alien: Rouge Incursion - Part One: Evolved Edition hits PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC September 30, 2025 and features "even deadlier Xenomorphs and enhanced visuals."

#AlienRogueIncursion #Gaming #IGN
title: Alien: Rogue Incursion - Part One: Evolved Edition Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Crimson Desert is a brand new, Open world, action adventure game from Pearl Abyss. I was lucky enough to go hands on with the game, speak to the developers and get details on the BlackSpace engine that powers it. Just what Technology is under the hood? Why it is so impressive and why this could be one of the biggest games of 2025. All that and much more, in our Crimson Desert IGN Performance preview.

Chapters
00:00 Introduction
00:29 Breaking down the BlackSpace engine features
02:55 Visual & Technology stack on show
04:30 More than just the engine
06:07 Combat, camera and areas of improvement
08:22 Summary

#IGN #Gaming
title: Crimson Desert Performance Preview

author: IGN
description: Palia is a high-fantasy cozy sim launching on PS5 and X Series X and S on May 13th #ad
title: Palia is a high-fantasy cozy sim launching on PS5 and X Series X and S on May 13th #ad

author: IGN
description:
A young, ambitious New York City matchmaker finds herself torn between the perfect match and her imperfect ex. Watch the new Materialists trailer for the upcoming film starring Dakota Johnson, Chris Evans, and Pedro Pascal. 

Materialists, written and directed by Celine Song, opens in theaters on June 13, 2025.

#Materialists #Movies #IGN
title: Materialists - Official Trailer 2 (2025) Dakota Johnson, Chris Evans, and Pedro Pascal

author: IGN
description:
What makes a game a classic? Is it its lasting impact? Impressive sales figures? Evolving gameplay? The Grand Theft Auto series is no stranger to these concepts. While many of its entries have become classics in their own right, very few games have had a lasting impact like GTA V.  So it’s no surprise that the ten-year-old, three-console-generation-spanning, crime simulator that so uniquely satirizes “American Dream” has managed to resonate deeply in the hearts and minds of millions and in turn, earn billions of dollars for Rockstar. But is financial success the only indication of a classic game? Or is it something else? And with the impending release of GTA 6, is it even possible for Rockstar to repeat history and have lighting strike twice? 
On this episode of IGN Rewind, we're taking a look back at one of the most influential, critically acclaimed, and popular video games ever, and why its genre-defining success may very well be the reason why it's taken Rockstar over 12 years to r
title: The Multi-Billion Dollar Legacy of Grand Theft Auto 5 | IGN Rewind

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the latest Masters of Ceremony Warbond Trailer for Helldivers 2, the third-person action online PvE shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. Players will be able to access brand new content for the game with the new upcoming Masters of Ceremony Warbond, such as the R-2 Amendment, the CQC-2 Sabre, and more. The Masters of Ceremony Warbond is also fitted with new cosmetics, throwables, and Strategems to rain lethality upon the frontlines. The Master of Ceremony Warbond is launching on May 15 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#Helldivers2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Helldivers 2 - Official Masters of Ceremony Warbond Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the full episode here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t58O07q65AQ . With game prices steadily climbing, fans are starting to wonder: Will GTA 6 be the first $100 next-gen video game? In this clip from Unlocked 692, the crew breaks down the economics behind premium game pricing and whether GTA 6’s massive scale and hype could justify a triple-digit price tag. 

For all the latest news and discussion around the always-busy and always-changing world of Xbox, be sure to check out Unlocked. It’s IGN’s weekly Xbox show, hosted by Ryan McCaffrey, who’s been covering Xbox professionally since 2002; Miranda Sanchez, an Xbox expert and superfan who’s been playing Xbox since she was a kid; and Michael Higham, an RPG guru whose Xbox roots run deep. New episodes of Unlocked drop every Thursday on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever you get your shows, with full video versions on IGN.com and YouTube. Unlocked Is produced by IGN, and part of the Geek Media podcast network.
title: Is GTA 6 About to Break the $100 Price Barrier? - Unlocked Clips

description:

Presented by Revenge of the Savage Planet

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2: On the Beach can be seen as an attempt to take the premises of the first game to the next level. And now that we’ve played its sequel for more than 30 hours at a special press event at Kojima Productions’ Tokyo office, we are starting to realize that it may have been only the beginning. Previewed by Koji Fukuyama

#IGN #Gaming #DeathStranding2
title: We Played Death Stranding 2 for 30 Hours
